item.description:
Come join your fellow paddlers for a fun night out with family and friends at a Worcester Sharks hockey game on Saturday March 26!  Group tickets are only $11 each, a significant discount off box-office prices!  You need to order the tickets directly from the Sharks, I have sent out an e-mail with that information, or you can also find it in the More/Files menu at the top of this page. 

If you have any questions please feel free to contact me directly!  I look forward to seeing you at the game!

Christine
item.name: Family Night with the Worcester Sharks!
